name: TRF - The Race Factory
description:
The Race Factory is made with a heavy emphasis on multiplayer and the ability to create your own race tracks. Taking inspiration from arcade racing games of the 80's and 90's, featuring drift physics, weapons to give you the advantage over the competition, and plenty of customization, the aim is to have a fun multiplayer experience, with plenty of variety to keep you entertained!

Features:

- A healthy serving of game modes are available, from Racing, to Drift, to Infection, and more! There's a bunch of game modes for everyone to enjoy! All game modes support AI drivers and all game modes support at least 4 local players, some game modes support up to 8 local players!

- Track Editor included in the game. This track editor was used to build all the tracks that come with the game, so you can create an endless amount of tracks to enjoy! This includes a racing line editor, allowing you to fine-tune the AI's behaviour on your track. The track editor is capable of making both racing tracks and custom Battle Arenas.

- 12 Race Tracks and 3 Battle Arenas come with the game, so if creating tracks isn't your thing, you can jump straight into the game and battle it out with your friends!

- Online leaderboards allow you to compete against the world in Mission mode or Time Trial mode. Missions are short challenges around technical courses. Time Trial mode pits you against the worlds best, where everyone is on a level-footing, and competition is fierce to get the best time!

- 4 Car classes, Street, Sport, Super & Hyper. You can take it easy in the Street class, with fairly grippy tyres and plenty of time to react, it's the ideal choice for newer or younger drivers. But when you feel ready, hop into a Hyper car for some edge-of-your-seat racing!

- A variety of power-ups are available to mess with your opponents, from a Bolt that will force your target into a drift, a Strike that will hit the driver in 1st position, a nifty Nitro to boost yourself ahead of the pack, to a Shield that will help you stay there!

- Choose your time of day and weather settings! Race on a sunny morning, Drift on a rainy evening, perhaps even play Infection on a stormy night? Be careful though, in snowy weather, the cars won't respond how you'd like! You can even drive during a meteor shower!

- Then we have the Mutators, fun little settings you can change to switch things up, from disabling brakes whilst forcing cars to always be accelerating, to making the ground icy, even in clear weather, there's a few little surprises in there to keep the action interesting!
